Title: WPF Prism Starter Kit
Description: The goal of this project is to deliver a partitioned project skeleton to use prism with WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The goal of this project is to deliver a partitioned project skeleton to use prism with WPF.

The first release is simple and implement a "Splash Screen" in a separated module.

The next steps will offer sample, but well defined implementations for classical application layers and features as service, data access, security, cache...¨
